faqs.q: How many calories are in a Clif bar?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard 68 g Clif Energy Bar.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in a Clif bar?
faqs.a: About 10 g of protein per bar, ideal for post-workout recovery.

faqs.q: Are Clif bars high in sugar?
faqs.a: They contain around 17 g of sugars per bar, mainly from organic sources like brown rice syrup.
